input_email_body:
Subject: 

Customer Support, reporting a critical issue with the project management tool. The key feature, task assignment, has stopped working and I suspect it might be related to a recent code update. Despite rolling back the update and clearing the cache, the problem still persists You can reach me at elena.ivanova@support.org.. I've attempted to troubleshoot the issue but was unable to resolve it on my own. I would greatly appreciate it if you could look into this matter urgently and provide a solution as soon as possible. Please let us My name is Omar Hassan.
